body: In a scary fashion this reminds me of how "treat your kid well, and you'll be rewarded later down the road....kick the dog, pay the price!" Stepdad was a rapist, but in the kid mind he cared (i mean he did say he was willing to put up with a woman he hated to get access to him! To the impressionable boy, it's a positive as he was at his lowest). But as shown he knew stepdad "might" run so need to assure HIS control

The one thing that some of you seem to be missing is that yeah she was exploiting the guy but she never knew about the rape until she did! But instead of acting like a mother she instead acted like a woman! Acting as though her child tempted "her man on purpose!" It's why he broke and "gave in to stepdad"..or more "blackmailed him" as he felt he was the only one who cared! (Sad when the only one to care about you is your pedo rapist!) Scary thing is he thinks he helped his stepdad by getting rid of the leech "in the way"

well ... i was curious about this story so read it.. most say that the mom was to blame here, keep on gambling panicko..  throw money; the moment she find out about the son been abused.. should have divorce and stop gambling, but i guess it got to the point of addiction so that out weighten the son abused in her eyes.. just my opinion.
